mapper.select: SELECT num, contents, date, FROM data;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data(contents, date, rw) values (#{contents}, #{date}, #{rw});
mapper.select: SELECT (select count(*) from data where rw = 'WW') as "LOCAL_WRITE", (select count(*) from data where rw = 'RR') as "LOCAL_READ", (select count(*) from data where rw = 'W') as "AS_WRITE", (select count(*) from data where rw = 'R') as "AS_READ", count(*) as "TOTAL", CASE WHEN inet_server_addr()::text LIKE '10.0.2.53%' THEN 'master' WHEN inet_server_addr()::text LIKE '10.0.2.108%' THEN 'slave1' WHEN inet_server_addr()::text LIKE '10.0.2.36%' THEN 'slave2' end as host_address FROM data;
